entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Drayton Valley

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening then light before morning. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 05 February 2023
